data.name: Cattails: Wildwood Story
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist & Follow Us!


Become a cat! Experience life as a feral feline in a strange wilderness. Prowl through dense forests, murky swamps, rocky highlands, and sandy beaches in search of rare herbs and delicious prey. Build and customize your colony's base of operations and attract new residents to grow a prosperous community. Meet a personality-filled cast of unique cats and bring back gifts from your travels to make friends!



Life in the Wildwood is constant give and take: there is both a bounty of resources to harvest and endless challenges to overcome. Under the dark eaves of the trees, sinister shadows lurk, ready to strike at the unwary. You must protect your colony from the threat that lies at the heart of the land.



  • Befriend, date, or marry one of unique cats!
  • Customize your character with the all-new Coat Studio
  • Fight evil voidling creatures and new hostile prey with the improved real-time combat system
  • Tend to your garden to grow the best quality herbs to use, gift, or sell
  • New mechanics for building, growing, and customizing your very own colony of cats
  • Two hours of original kitten-inspired music by veteran composer Tormod Garvin
  • Delve deep into the heart of the earth to seek treasure in the dangerous mines
  • Raise a litter of kittens!

data.short_description: Lead your colony of cats into the mysterious Wildwood. Stalk prey to find food, defend your new home from dark intruders, and discover fresh herbs & ancient treasures. Build a thriving town for all cats to call home. Get to know the residents, fall in love, and raise a litter of kittens!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12.0 Monterey
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
